title: S14 Ep47: The Enfield Poltergeist Tapes with Dr. Melvyn Willin

description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS hears The Enfield Poltergeist Tapes with Dr. Melvyn Willin.

Much has been reported regarding the controversial Enfield Poltergeist Case and here for the first time is the actual transcripts of the hundreds of hours of live audio recordings done during the investigations. What REALLY took place? You decide!

Get the book here: https://amazon.com

View the video referenced in today's episode here: https://bit.ly/2I1B091
